original_text: They stayed at their places around God's house during each night. It was their work to keep it safe. Each morning they would use their key to open the gates.
korean_text: 그들은 하나님의 성전을 맡은 직분이 있으므로 성전 주위에서 밤을 지내며 아침마다 문을 여는 책임이 그들에게 있었더라

sentences.original_text: around God's house during each night
It was their work to keep it safe
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 안전하게 지키는 것이 그들의 일이었습니다

sentences.original_text: Each morning they would use their key
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 아침 그들은 그들의 열쇠를 사용했습니다
